ValidationRule.description: If PO Required is "Mandatory" and PO Number is NULL, then do not allow Finance to move opportunity to Closed Won.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Account.PO_Required__c , "Mandatory"), ISBLANK( PO_Number__c ) , ISCHANGED( StageName ) , ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Closed Won"), $Profile.Name = "PF Finance" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Stage cannot be Closed won, when the PO Number field is Blank.
